info.title: Search v2 - beta
info.description: The Search API v2 provides a set of JSON:API compatible endpoints for searching the TIDAL metadata catalogue: albums, artists, tracks, videos, and more

get.summary: Search for music metadata by a query
get.description: Search for music: albums, artists, tracks, etc.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Allows the client to customize which related resources should be returned. Available options: artists, albums, tracks, videos, playlists, topHits

415.description: Unsupported Media Type. The API is using content negotiation. Ensure the proper media type is set into Content-Type header.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of tokens currently remaining. Refer to X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate header for replenishment information.

X-RateLimit-Burst-Capacity.description: Initial number of tokens, and max number of tokens that can be replenished.

X-RateLimit-Replenish-Rate.description: Number of tokens replenished per second.

id.description: unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem

status.description: HTTP status code applicable to this problem

detail.description: human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the value in the request document that caused the error

parameter.description: string indicating which URI query parameter caused the error.

header.description: string indicating the name of a single request header which caused the error

Error_Object_Source.description: object containing references to the primary source of the error

self.description: the link that generated the current response document

explicit.description: Indicates whether an album consist of any explicit content

copyright.example: (p)(c) 2017 S. CARTER ENTERPRISES, LLC. MARKETED BY ROC NATION & DISTRIBUTED BY ROC NATION/UMG RECORDINGS INC.

availability.description: Defines an album availability e.g. for streaming, DJs, stems

imageLinks.description: Represents available links to, and metadata about, an album cover images

videoLinks.description: Represents available links to, and metadata about, an album cover videos

externalLinks.description: Represents available links to something that is related to an album resource, but external to the TIDAL API

Albums_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

Albums_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

imageLinks.description: Represents available links to, and metadata about, an artist images

externalLinks.description: Represents available links to something that is related to an artist resource, but external to the TIDAL API

Artists_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

Artists_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

Artists_Track_Providers_Relationship.description: Providers that have released tracks for this artist

numberOfTracks.description: total number of tracks released together with the provider

href.description: link to something that is related to a resource

description.example: All the good details about what is inside this playlist

bounded.description: Indicates if the playlist has a duration and set number of tracks

duration.description: Duration of the playlist expressed in accordance with ISO 8601

numberOfItems.description: Number of items in the playlist

lastModifiedAt.description: Datetime of last modification of the playlist (ISO 8601)

Playlists_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

href.description: link to something that is related to a resource

Playlists_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

Providers_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

Providers_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

Search_Results_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

Search_Results_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

version.description: Version of the album's item; complements title

duration.description: Duration expressed in accordance with ISO 8601

copyright.example: (p)(c) 2017 S. CARTER ENTERPRISES, LLC. MARKETED BY ROC NATION & DISTRIBUTED BY ROC NATION/UMG RECORDINGS INC.

explicit.description: Indicates whether a catalog item consist of any explicit content

popularity.description: Track or video popularity (ranged in 0.00 ... 1.00). Conditionally visible

availability.description: Defines a catalog item availability e.g. for streaming, DJs, stems

externalLinks.description: Represents available links to something that is related to a catalog item, but external to the TIDAL API

Tracks_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

Tracks_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

Users_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

Users_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

version.description: Version of the album's item; complements title

duration.description: Duration expressed in accordance with ISO 8601

copyright.example: (p)(c) 2017 S. CARTER ENTERPRISES, LLC. MARKETED BY ROC NATION & DISTRIBUTED BY ROC NATION/UMG RECORDINGS INC.

explicit.description: Indicates whether a catalog item consist of any explicit content

popularity.description: Track or video popularity (ranged in 0.00 ... 1.00). Conditionally visible

availability.description: Defines a catalog item availability e.g. for streaming, DJs, stems

imageLinks.description: Represents available links to, and metadata about, an album item images

externalLinks.description: Represents available links to something that is related to a catalog item, but external to the TIDAL API

Videos_Attributes.description: attributes object representing some of the resource's data

Videos_Relationships.description: relationships object describing relationships between the resource and other resources

Authorization_Code_PKCE.description: Use this grant flow to access users both personalized and non-personalized TIDAL data.

scopes.user.read: Read access to a user's account information, such as country and email address.
scopes.entitlements.read: Read access to a user's entitlements
scopes.playlists.read: Read access to a user's playlists
scopes.recommendations.read: Read access to a user's recommendations
scopes.public-profile.read: Read access to a user's public profile
scopes.public-profile.write: Write access to a user's public profile

Client_Credentials.description: Use this grant flow to access non-personalized TIDAL data.
